short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to get your recipes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blah, blah blah. Many of the sites that contain recipes have loads of useless information before the actually recipe. This extension allows you to skip that useless information and go directly to the recipe. Also, finding the print button can often be a difficult task as it is sometimes hidden. With this extension a simple click of a button allows quick and easy access to the print page of the recipe.
